description: To further encourage developers to post their job offers, we've created a new system that makes things easier than ever before!

author.name: NEW JOB OFFER CHANNEL + TOOLS NOW AVAILABLE!

fields.name: Here are some key features of the new system:
fields.value:
**-** Dedicated website to quickly post your offers
**-** New creation tool which does the work for you
**-** Better overview and automatically formatted messages
**-** Directly receive PM notifications for new job offers
ᅠ

fields.name: Check out the job offers form:
